docs.title: Installation
docs.text: I strongly recommend to use pipx or uv to install this tool. These tools will install the package in an isolated environment and will not interfere with your system packages.

docs.title: Using pip
docs.text:
[!WARNING]

It is not recommended to install this package using pip. It will install the package in your system packages and may interfere with other packages.

pip install speedtest-cloudflare-cli

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Run the following command to test your internet speed.

speedtest-cli

For more information, run the --help command.

speedtest-cli --help
